'''12w23b''' is the tenth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.3.1]], released on June 7, 2012<ref>{{cite|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20120609223358/https://www.mojang.com/2012/06/minecraft-snapshot-week-23/|title=Minecraft Snapshot Week 23|website=mojang.com}}</ref> to fix some of the bugs and crashes in the [[12w23a]] snapshot.

== Fixes ==
'''1 bug fixed'''
* Fixed frequent null pointer exceptions in Survival mode when blocks were instantly mined with a tool.</onlyinclude>
